title: Workout Open Data Interchange Specification (WODIS)
description: A portable, human-readable, machine-parseable format for logging resistance-training sessions. This schema defines the structure of a single workout session including exercises, sets, and optional per-rep data.

wodis_version.title: WODIS Version
wodis_version.description: The version of the WODIS specification this document conforms to.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Metadata about the recording source, athlete, and entry method.

session.title: Session
session.description: The workout session containing exercises and sets.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Metadata about how the session was recorded, who performed it, and which application produced the data.

source.title: Source
source.description: The application or method that originally recorded this session (e.g. 'strong', 'hevy', 'fitbod').

entry_method.title: Entry Method
entry_method.description: How the data was entered into the source application.

athlete.title: Athlete
athlete.description: Display name or identifier for the person who performed the workout.

_extra.title: Extra
_extra.description: App-specific extension data. MUST be preserved on round-trip import/export.

session.title: Session
session.description: A single workout session, anchored by a start time and containing one or more exercises.

started_at.title: Started At
started_at.description: ISO 8601 date-time when the session began.

load_unit.title: Load Unit
load_unit.description: Unit for all load values in this document.

ended_at.title: Ended At
ended_at.description: ISO 8601 date-time when the session ended.

location.title: Location
location.description: Name or description of the gym or location where the session took place.

split_type.title: Split Type
split_type.description: Training split label for this session (e.g. 'push', 'pull', 'legs', 'upper', 'full body').

exercises.title: Exercises
exercises.description: Ordered list of exercises performed during this session.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Free-text notes about the session as a whole.

_extra.title: Extra
_extra.description: App-specific extension data. MUST be preserved on round-trip import/export.

exercise.title: Exercise
exercise.description: A single exercise performed during a session, containing one or more sets.

display_name.title: Display Name
display_name.description: Human-readable name of the exercise as shown in the source app (e.g. 'Bench Press (Barbell)').

started_at.title: Started At
started_at.description: ISO 8601 date-time when this exercise began within the session.

canonical_ids.title: Canonical IDs
canonical_ids.description: Map of namespace to canonical exercise identifier (e.g. {"wger": "192", "exrx": "bench-press-barbell"}).

muscle_groups.title: Muscle Groups
muscle_groups.description: List of primary muscle groups targeted by this exercise (e.g. ['chest', 'triceps', 'anterior_deltoid']).

variation.title: Variation
variation.description: Specific variation or modifier for the exercise (e.g. 'incline', 'close-grip', 'pause').

sets.title: Sets
sets.description: Ordered list of sets performed for this exercise.

_extra.title: Extra
_extra.description: App-specific extension data. MUST be preserved on round-trip import/export.

set.title: Set
set.description: A single set within an exercise, recording reps completed, load used, and optional metadata like RPE, RIR, and form flags.

reps_completed.title: Reps Completed
reps_completed.description: Number of repetitions completed in this set.

load.title: Load
load.description: Weight used for this set in the unit declared by session.load_unit. Negative values indicate assisted weight. Zero for bodyweight.

reps.title: Reps
reps.description: Optional per-rep breakdown with individual load and completion data.

set_type.title: Set Type
set_type.description: Classification of this set's purpose within the exercise.

rpe.title: RPE
rpe.description: Rate of Perceived Exertion on the Borg CR-10 scale (1 = very easy, 10 = maximal effort).

rir.title: RIR
rir.description: Reps In Reserve: estimated number of additional reps that could have been performed.

rest_seconds_actual.title: Rest Seconds (Actual)
rest_seconds_actual.description: Actual rest time in seconds taken after the previous set before this set began.

is_failure.title: Is Failure
is_failure.description: Whether the set was taken to muscular failure.

form_flags.title: Form Flags
form_flags.description: Tags indicating form deviations observed during the set (e.g. ['hip_shift', 'shortened_rom']).

superset_id.title: Superset ID
superset_id.description: Identifier grouping sets that are performed as part of the same superset.

superset_sequence.title: Superset Sequence
superset_sequence.description: Order of this set within the superset (1-based).

transition_time_seconds.title: Transition Time (Seconds)
transition_time_seconds.description: Time in seconds to transition between exercises within a superset.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: ISO 8601 date-time when this individual set was performed.

_extra.title: Extra
_extra.description: App-specific extension data. MUST be preserved on round-trip import/export.

rep.title: Rep
rep.description: Per-repetition data capturing individual rep load and completion status for detailed tracking.

load.title: Load
load.description: Weight for this specific repetition in the unit declared by session.load_unit (useful for drop-within-set or variable-load protocols).

assisted.title: Assisted
assisted.description: Whether this rep was performed with external assistance (e.g. spotter help).

partial.title: Partial
partial.description: Whether this rep used a partial range of motion rather than full ROM.

completed.title: Completed
completed.description: Whether this rep was completed successfully through the intended range of motion.

_extra.title: Extra
_extra.description: App-specific extension data. MUST be preserved on round-trip import/export.
